So I'm off in Texas in some suburb of Dallas, spending Turkey day with Shelley's family.  And, naturally, I have to login and deal with issues of Top 500 tag spam, a new bug that cropped up, etc.  So I go over to Shelley's Dad's PC and type into the Run command "Putty".  And it works.   Clearly I've been on this PC before.

(Putty is a SSH client that I use religiously for logging into Feedster servers).
